interactivity.requirements: You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Lifting the Curse "

progression.synopsis: Sensei visits Tsuneyo 's ramen shop again. She is pleased that the " curse " came to nothing. She talks a little about the shop and its surrounding area, noting that most of the local people are poor, elderly, or both. Sensei orders a Green Dragon, and Tsuneyo again reveals her sheltered upbringing when she seems not to know that dragons are mythical. Occasionally, she makes an attempt at informal speech or telling jokes â€” Sensei says that he will help her improve.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.7.
